DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare oxidative stress marker immunologic characteristic HIV-infected non-HIV subject bout moderate aerobic exercise follow resistance exercise
DOC.criteria: HIV Group : without contraindication exercise training ; highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) least 6 month enrollment ; classify low level physical activity international physical activity questionnaire ( IPAQ ) use antioxidant supplement . Control Group : negative result HIV1 test criterion describe Subjects previous history cardiovascular neurological disease , diabetes , dyslipidemia , tobacco use , physical disability pregnant woman exclude study .
